steps.title: Create Newsletter Campaign
steps.prompt: Create campaign 'Monthly Newsletter - January 2025' with subject 'This Month's Top Stories' using template newsletter_v2 for segment newsletter_subscribers from Editorial Team <news@company.com>

steps.title: Schedule Newsletter
steps.prompt: Schedule this campaign for first Tuesday of next month at 10 AM EST
steps.notes: Adjust date based on current date

steps.title: Set Up Recurring Automation
steps.prompt: Create newsletter automation to send monthly on first Tuesday at 10 AM using template newsletter_v2 to segment newsletter_subscribers
